thread.title: RJ Picks: UNLV at Fresno State
thread.title_full: RJ Picks: UNLV at Fresno State

title: RJ Picks: UNLV at Fresno State
text:
RJ Picks: UNLV at Fresno State RJ Picks: UNLV at Fresno State 
The UNLV Rebels football team‘s new helmets are seen during UNLV football media day at Sam Boyd Stadium on Thursday, Aug. 13, 2015. (BIZUAYEHU TESFAYE/LAS VEGAS REVIEW-JOURNAL) 
Check our GameDay page for all the news leading up to the UNLV-Fresno State game. Las Vegas Review-Journal 
The Rebels and Bulldogs meet under the Friday night lights at Bulldog Stadium in Fresno tonight. Kickoff is at 7:30 p.m. PT. 
UNLV is a 5-point favorite and our experts have made their predictions below. 
Do you have a prediction? Leave it in the comments or Tweet your pick using #RJpicks. Prediction: UNLV 30, Fresno St 24. The last time the Rebels were favored by a touchdown on the road was 2011. #RJpicks  Matt Youmans (@mattyoumans247) October 16, 2015 Prediction: #unlvfb 27, Fresno State 23. It won't be easy, but the once-mighty Bulldogs are just a shadow of what they once were #rjpicks  Adam Hill (@AdamHillLVRJ) October 16, 2015 Prediction: UNLV 31, Fresno St 20. Rebels know they need this game, and this is a bad Fresno St team. #RJPicks  Brett Steidler (@bsteid) October 16, 2015 Predictions: UNLV 38 Fresno 14 FSU has lost by 2 or more scores in all 5 losses. Giving up 211 Rush ypg. Rebels young RBs go off #RJpicks  Colton Lochhead (@ColtonLochhead) October 16, 2015 Prediction: UNLV 30, Fresno St 21 Under Friday night lights the UNLV Rebels will be the actual Bulldogs on both sides of the ball #RJPicks
